card.name: Adena
card.text: Unique. Playable at Mispír if the influence check is greater than 8.Standart Modifications: Men (+1), all others (-2), Clans of the Drêl (+2 if contolled by you), Clans of the Pel (+2 +2 if contolled by you)

attr.value: Contains a hoard. Animal and drake creatures keyable to Coastal Sea [c] may be keyed to this site.
Contains a hoard. Animal and drake creatures keyable to Coastal Sea [c] may be keyed to this site.

card.name: Ally of the Black Land
card.text: Playable if you have either Open Alliance in play or receive the mp from a Secret alliance in play. You are considered a minion player for all aspects of the game. You can win the game by taking The One Ring to Dol Guldur or Barad-dûr. You cannot play any further hero resources or hero characters. Cannot be duplicated on a given player. You may search for this card if Cast from the Order was played on you.

attr.value: Men - Each character faces a strike with 6 prowess (detainment)
Port. A company moving to this site may tap a diplomat to use Bridge as if it was a Haven [H].
Men — Each character faces a strike with 8 prowess (detainment against covert companies)
Port. A company moving to this site may tap a diplomat to use Forch March as if it was a Darkhaven [K].

card.name: Araphor
card.text: Unique. Valdacli Lord. Can use spirit-magic. +2 EI against character and factions playable at sites in Mirëdor. Against Nazgul, +3 to her prowess, and his body is halved (round up).

attr.value: Barrow-wight may be keyed to this site. If the Undead attack was defeated this site contains a hoard till the end of the turn.
Barrow-wight may be keyed to this site. If the Undead attack was defeated this site contains a hoard till the end of the turn.
Port. If an animal ally is played at this site, opponent may take a disease hazard from his discard pile to his hand.
Men — 5 strikes with 9 prowess (detainment against covert companies)

Port. If an animal ally is played at this site, opponent may take a disease hazard from his discard pile to his hand. Any agent with a home sitein the Dominions of the Seven may come into play at this site.

card.name: Arthrazoc
card.text: Unique. Valdacli Lord. +1 EI against characters and factions playable at sites in Pel. May use Persuasive Words against any influence attempt he makes; if successful shuffle Persuasive Words into your deck, instead of discarding it.

attr.value: Items (minor, major, greater*, gold ring) *non-battle-gear item only
(1st) Traps — each character faces a strike with 7 prowess; (2nd) opponent may play any non-unique undead creature from hand, or siteboard as a 2nd automatic attack.
Men — 4 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment if company contains no Magri characters)
Men — 4 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment if company contains no Magri characters or overt characters)
Port. Port on XXX. Black Númenoreans faction is playable at this site.
Port on XXX. *Any gold ring item is playable here. Black Númenoreans faction is playable at this site.

* Discard either food item from the company or a resource card from your hand to make items playable here this turn. If you discard both a food item and a resource from your hand, this site contains a hoard till the end of the turn.
Dwarves — 4 strikes with 9 prowess (detainment against covert companies)
The first item played by a covert company does not tap the site, if the company discards a food item it controls.

card.name: Chailla
card.text: Unique. Playable at Emyn Din if the influence check is greater than 12.Standart modifications: any overt faction you have in play in the Dominions of the Seven (-3)tap if you defeat a creature attack without an asterix (*) keyed to the any region in the Uttersouth, to take a ranger resource or a card playable at any hidden site in the Uttersouth from your discard pile or deck to your hand.

card.name: Clans of the Drêl
card.text: Playable at any Border-hold [B], Free-hold [F] or Shadow-hold [S] in Drêl, where no other factions is in play, if the influence check is greater than 8.Standart modifications: Dwarves (+1), Elves (+2), overt characters (-4), Adena (+1), Clans of the Drêl (+2 if controlled by a hero player, -2 if controlled by a minion player), Clans of the Pel (+2 if controlled by a hero player, -2 if controlled by a minion player), Sanâr (-3), Sederi (-2). This faction is worth 1 mp for each copy of Clans of the Drêl you have in active play.Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: Clans of the Pel
card.text: Playable at any Border-hold [B], Free-hold [F] or Shadow-hold [S] in Pel, where no other factions is in play, if the influence check is greater than 8.Standart modifications: Dwarves (+2), Elves (-1), overt characters (-4), Adena (+1), Clans of the Drêl (+2 if controlled by a hero player, -2 if controlled by a minion player), Clans of the Pel (+2 if controlled by a hero player, -2 if controlled by a minion player), Magri (-3), Sederi (-2). This faction is worth 1 mp for each copy of Clans of the Pel you have in active play.Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

attr.value: Traps — each character faces a strike with 5 prowess (using his mind value); the prowess is 10 against over companies.
Hidden site. Discard a stolen knowledge from the company when this site is revealed. The first information resource played at this site does not tap it.
Traps — each character faces a strike with 5 prowess (detainment using his mind value)

Hidden site. Tap an Elf or an Valdacli-lord when this site card is revealed. Characters may tap to remove corruption cards during the site phase with +2 to the removal roll (if they have not attempted to remove the card before

card.name: Cuind
card.text: Unique. Playable at Valagalen if the influence check is greater than 8.Standart modifications: Silvan (+2), Nando (+1), Sinda (-2), Noldo (-2) Khelno (-2)Tap this faction to let a resource targeting a wilderness [w] target a jungle [j] instead.

card.name: Daroc
card.text: Unique. Valdacli Lord. Unless he controls a horse ally, his company may normally move only 3 regions. For influencing factions or characters he is also considered a diplomat.

card.name: Derei
card.text: Unique. +4 EI against The Society of Derei faction.

card.name: Dwarves of Blackflame
card.text: Unique. Playable at Baruzimabûl, if the influence check is greater than 9.Standard modifications: Dwarves (+1), Stiffbeard Dwarves (+1), Valdacli Lord (+3)tap and discard a food item you control, to place a non-hoard, non-unique battle-gear item with any site Dunadan- or Man-hold where you have a faction in play, the item is considered stored at the site.

attr.value: Traps — Swamp Gas - each character faces a strike with 5 prowess

Swamp. Any non-unique animal faction is playable here. If Beast of the Woods is played here, keep this card with the faction, for this version of the faction the canceling ability works for Elorna and its adjacent non Coastal Sea [c] regions.
Traps — Swamp Gas - each character faces a strike with 5 prowess

Any non-unique animal faction is playable here. If Beast of the Woods is played here, keep this card with the faction, for this version of the faction the canceling ability works for Elorna and its adjacent non Coastal Sea [c] regions.

card.name: Emchangodogo
card.text: Unique. Drake. 3 strikes.

attr.value: Hidden site. Discard a Lost Knowledge (from the company) or tap Wose character (within the company) or Wose faction you control when this site is revealed.
Woses — 3 strikes with 7 prowess (detainment against covert companies)
Hidden site. Discard a Lost Knowledge (from the company) or tap Wose character (within the company) or Wose faction you control when this site is revealed.

card.name: Farijin (Gettaniyan)
card.text: Unique. Playable at any non port site in Tulwang or Zajantak if you discard a treasure item from the company if the influence check is greater then 7.tap cancel any non-unique creature attack keyed to Curinshiban, Tulwang or Zajantak keyed to the region by type or name.

card.name: Frôr V
card.text: Unique. Stiffbeard. +1 prowess against Drakes. +2 EI against Stiffbeard Dwarves. -1 to his CC. -2 CC if character with higher mind is in his company.

card.name: Háin
card.text: Unique. Stiffbeard. Leader. +1 prowess while at or moving to an Under-deeps site. +1 to his CC while at an Under-deeps site. -1 to all his rolls if Gates of Morning is in play.

card.name: Hargrog
card.text: Unique. Half-troll. Leader. +2 EI against orcs, trolls and characters (or factions playable) in the Uttersouth. If you have him in your starting company you must start the game at his home site and you may include slayer characters in your starting company and deck.

card.name: Imrazôr III
card.text: Unique. Valdacli Lord. +2 EI against characters and factions playable at sites in Elorna. tap Imrazôr III during your end-of-turn phase and discard a diplomat only resource from your hand to shuffle any other diplomat only resource from your discard pile to your deck.

attr.value: Men/Dunedain — 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against covert companies)
Undead — 2 strikes with 8 prowess (cannot be canceled if a manifestation of Malezar is in play)
Undead — 2 strikes with 8 prowess (cannot be canceled if a manifestation of Malezar is in play)

Port. If any manifestation of Akhôrahil is in play, all hero factions at this site are worth 1 extra miscellaneous mp; all heros at this site receive +2 prowess against minions and attacks keyed to the site.

Port. If any manifestation of Akhôrahil is in play

card.name: Magri
card.text: Playable at any site in Mag or Tumag if the influence check is greater than 7.Standart modifications: Dunedain (+1), Dwarves (-3), Elves (-2), Men (+1), Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: Malezar
card.text: Unique. If you are Adûnaphel the Ringwraith, he requires only 4 points of influence to control. If tapped after his company defeats an hazard-creature and he faces at least one strike, you can untap him.

card.name: Men of Ciryatanírë
card.text: Unique. Playable at Lond Anarion if the influence check is greater than 11.Standart modifcations: Dunadan (+2), Army of the Southern Dragon in play (+2 if by an opponent; -4 if by you). This faction is considered a Dunadan faction if opponent controls no copy of Black Númenóreans. This factions is worth 4 mp to a Black player.

card.name: Men of Mirëdor
card.text: Unique. Playable at Ostelor if the influence it greater than 11.Standart modifications: Dunedain (+2), Elves (+2), Men (-2), an avatar (-3), any overt character (-5). This faction is by Sentinels of Númenór and/or Alliance of Free Peoples as if it where a Man faction. This faction is worth 5 mp to non-hero player.

card.name: Men of Sûlcoron
card.text: Unique. Playable at Tol Turgul if the influence check is greater than 9.Standart modifications: Dunedain (+1) tap make either Sons of Kings keyable to any region in the Dominions of the Seven, or to have any Free-hold [F] and Border-hold [B] site in the Dominions of the Seven be effected by Beacons Alight. This faction is worth an additional mp (to a maximum of 3) for each character eliminated by Sons of Kings keyed to a region within the Dominions of the Seven.

attr.value: Port. A character with a port as a home site may tap to make one food itemsplayable from your discard pile.
Men — 4 strikes with 7 prowess (detainment against cover companies)
Port. A character with a port as a home site may tap to make one food items playable from your discard pile. Any agent with a home site in the Dominions of the Seven may come into play at this site.

card.name: Nandran
card.text: Unique. Playable at ??? if the influence check is greater than 6.Standart modifcations: Dúnadan (-2), Sânar (-2), Dwarves of Mablad-dûm (+2)

card.name: Níocúpa
card.text: Unique. Drake. 3 strikes.

card.name: Open Alliance
card.text: You may play a Valdacli lord at his home site (or in your starting company, you must start the game at his home site). If you have not yet revealed an avatar he may only come into play in the Dominions of the Seven (or its adjacent territories). You receive this card’s mp if you have a faction host of 5 or more factions under the control of the Valdacli lord at your avatar’s Haven site [H].

attr.value: Port. If any version this site turns into a Border-hold [B], the automatic-attack type is also considered Men. *Contains a hoard if the company discards a Information card it controls.
Dunedain — 4 strikes with 9 prowess; can only be canceled by a skill card
Port. If any version this site turns into a Border-hold [B], the automatic-attack type is also considered Men. *Contains a hoard if the company discards a Information card it controls.

card.name: Phorakôn
card.text: Unique. Valdacli Lord. +2 prowess against magic users. Phorakôn is considered a sage for every item he bears. +2 EI against Men of Sûlcoron faction.

card.name: Princedom of Mirëdor
card.text: Place this card on a Valdacli as he enters play. If bearer controls another Valdacli under his EI, and you control a faction for each of their home sites, you may tap either to cancel an attack against their company with the Dominions of the Seven. You receive this card’s mp if you have either 3 factions in play at Ballte-ground sites within the Uttersouth or if you besiege at least 3 sites where an opponent’s faction(s) are present. Discard this card if a minion faction host enters any of your above mentioned sites. Cannot be duplicated on a given Valdacli or a given factions.

attr.value: Port. If any version this site turns into a Free-hold [F], the automatic-attack type is also considered Dunadan. *If a Free-hold this site contains a hoard.
Men — 4 strikes with 10 prowess (detainment against covert companies)
Port. If this site turns into a Free-hold [F], the automatic-attack type is also considered Dunadan. *If a Free-hold this site contains a hoard.

card.name: Sanâr
card.text: Unique. Playable at any Oasis site in Tulwang or Curinshiban if the influence check is greater than 8.Standart modifcations: Etulians (-2), Farijin (-2), Nandran (-2)Something with sacrificing prisoners taken at this site, and if doing so bringing a Were-worm back to hand

card.name: Secret Alliance
card.text: Playable if you do not use more than 25 mind of agents in your deck. Place an Valdacli Lord (which is not in play as another player’s avatar) (do not reveal him) face down with this card and a face down home site. He now acts as a dual agent. When the the associated agent is revealed an avatar controlling Valdacli Lord as a character must make a CC -3. You may tap your avatar (a manfestation of The Lidless Eye may always tap) if in the same territory as the agent to modify any roll by it by +2 (even during opponent’s turn). You must make a CC -3 if associtated agent is eliminated. You receives this card’s mp if this agents action, discard or eliminate an opponent’s character, faction or item.

card.name: Sederi
card.text: Playble at any site in Hyarn, Drêl, Elorna or Pel if the influence check is greater than 8. Standart modifications: Sederi (+2), any other man faction in play at their playable site (-3)This faction is worth 1 mp for every copy of Sederi in play.

card.name: Seregul
card.text: Unique. Valdacli Lord. +2 prowess against Animals and Orcs. Any Noble Hound under his control receives +1 prowess and +1 body.

card.name: Slow-fang
card.text: Animal. 1 strike. Attacker chooses defending characters. +1 to all body checks against hobbit, orcs and wose characters. You may play Venomous Sting (from your hand or your discard pile) on any character wounded by Slow-fang. May also be played keyed to Ruins & Lairs [R] in any Jungle [j].

card.name: Slûcrac
card.text: Unique. Agent. Slayer.

card.name: Southern Slayer
card.text: Slayer. 1 strike

card.name: Terilaen
card.text: Unique. Silvan. +1 EI against Silvan elves. +2 EI against Cuind faction. tap at Valagalen and discard a ritual from your hand for no effect, to make a roll, you may look at up to the number of cards from the top of your deck equal to your roll and place them in any order you choose; Terilaen makes a CC modified by half the number of cards (round up).

card.name: The Knifeless Ones
card.text: Slayer. 3 strikes. Playable keyed to any Border-hold [B] or Shadow-hold [S] in the Dominions of the Seven against non-Black player’s companies. If XXX is in play, The Knifeless Ones, may also be keyed to any regions within the Dominion of the Seven or to Border-holds [B] or Shadow-holds in any of its adjacent regions. If keyed to Border-hold [B] or region any scout or ranger in the company may tap to cancel a strike from this attack. Discard any men or wolf creature from your hand (not counting against hazard limit) to add that creature’s type to this slayer attack.

card.name: The Monks of Ereg Eiren
card.text: Unique. Playable at Eregost if the influence check is greater than 10.Standart modifications: Dwarves (-2), Dunedain (-2), Elves (-4), Ringrwraith (+3)tap to either increase the hazard limit against an non-Black player opponent’s company traveling in the Uttersouth by +1, or to bring any The Knifeless Ones creature from your discard pile to your deck.

card.name: The Society of Derei
card.text: Unique. Playable at Arpel if the influencecheck is greater than 9.Standart modifications: Dwarves (+1), Elves (-2) Men (+1). This faction is worth 3 mp if placed under Profitable Trade or if Arpel is used as a site for a hazard host card for a prisoner.

card.name: The Southern Slayers
card.text: Unique. Playable at Tower of Hargrog, if the influence check is greater than 12.Standart modifications: Leader (+2), War-lord (+2), Ringwraith (+2)tap make Creature of an Older World playable at Tower of Hargrog by any slayer or Ringwraith character. This faction is worth an additional mp (to a maximum of 4) for each character eliminted by either one of your slayer creatures or characters.

attr.value: If the automatic attack was faced, the first item at this site may be a hoard item. Valor in Battle may be played at this site without further requirements.
If the automatic attack was faced, the first item at this site may be a hoard item.
Dunedain — 2 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment if company contains a Dunadan or Elf)
If you tap a diplomat and a sage at this site, one Await the Advent of Allies or one Far-sight may be shuffled from your discard pile into your play deck.
Information, Items (minor, major, greater*, gold ring*)
(1st) Dunedain — each character faces a strike with 9 prowess; (2nd) Dunedain — 1 strike with 14 prowess (only against an avatar's or overt company)
*May only be played by an avatar's or overt company. An overt company must tap a character when this site is revealed.
Hidden site. *May also be a non-unique hoard item.

Only characters with a home site in the Uttersouth may be brought into play at this site. Any gold ring stored at this site is automatically tested (modify the roll by -2). If one of your companies is at this site all attacks against it are cancelled.

card.name: Ulrith
card.text: Unique. Kirani. Agent. Slayer. Can use shadow-magic. using poison and whatnot

card.name: Union of the Valdacli
card.text: Playble if you have at least 4 of the Valdacli Lords and Ladies in active play. Your Dunedain and Men factions within the Dominions of the Seven are effected by Alliance of the Free Peoples. This card is worth 1 mp (to a maximum of 4) for every race of which you control at least 2 characters and a faction playable at sites within the Dominions of the Seven. Discard this card if you the requirements to play are not met, or if a minion faction moves into the territory of the Dominions of the Seven. Cannot be duplicated.

attr.value: j c c c c j
I like a special with this Tree-seat thingy maybe ;)
(1st) Elves — Each character faces 1 strike with 9 prowess (detainment against covert companies); (2nd) Awakend Plants — 4 strikes with 11 prowess (against overt companies only)

Any company moving to this site has its hazard limit increased by 2. A minion company may not attack another company at this site. A Ringwraith may not move to this site, unless your Ringwraith has a home site in the Sun-lands or Uttersouth.

card.name: Warships of Harad
card.text: Playable at Barad Annûn if you have 3 factions playable at a port at this site.

attr.value: Hidden site. tap a sage or diplomat with a home site in the Dominions of the Seven, when this site card is revealed
Hidden site. tap a sage or diplomat with a home site in the Dominions of the Seven, when this site card is revealed
